title: The Ad Campaign to Turn Washington's Team Name To 'The R Word'
teaser: Melissa Block speaks with Chairman Marshall McKay of the Yocha Dehe Wintun Nation. His tribe purchased TV space for an ad criticizing the Washington Redskins name, set to run during the NBA finals.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
